post:
It's that time! Today, HostDoc Hosting is officially 365 days old and we are extremely happy to present ultra rare, only available during this promo, limited time offers to celebrate our birthday with.
As promised to quite a few, we have included a resource pool plan which includes our APAC locations also. Please view our [Special Pool Birthday Offers here](https://hostdochost.i.ng) as they do not meet LET's pricing guideline's.
Celebrate with us with exclusive plans for KVM VPS's, shared and reseller plans and resource pool offers all prepared especially for today with all offers available till the end of September or until they are sold out.

With HostDoc, you not only get a stable machine with all advertised resources available for your instance, you also get 24/7 support from friendly staff whom actually care about your needs and will do all we can to accommodate support needs if and when requested.

As a host still relatively new, we have lived up to our motto of providing first class service to our current clientelle and intend to continue on said path while continually improving the services offered as well as deployable locations all while focusing and striving to deliver exceptional support and assistance.
Our structure is geared towards sustainability and usability. Therefore, you can be sure we never overload our nodes, ensuring you always get the expected performance from our machines.

We accept Paypal, Stripe and Credit/Debit cards.
All VPS plans include a 7 Day Money Back guarantee.
